content.detailedDescription: He was at the wal-mart readin' durtbike mags by the register
content.summary: I dun sa bigfeet

content.detailedDescription: This occured the cloudy morning after that meteor, streaked across the nightsky of jersey(joisy in local terms)shaking up a crowd at a football game even. finally hit in upprt new york, i believe.Since the rain had stopped; i descided to roll(wheelchair traveler)down the street, a short two blocks, to the 7-11. to get a couple things i needed for breakfast, and maybe scratch a couple tickets for quick cash?(wishful thinking). as i turned to backup their steap ramp, to their doorlevel sidewalk, i noticed something strange, up in the sky in a gap between the clouds to the east. a nice lasy had pulled in,and parked. she walked around her car and asked if there was anything wrong?,i said i hope not, pointing to thegiant roll of "lifesavers",hhanging about a thousand feet,or so, over the potomac river to the east!.Several more people had gathered around; wondering what we were staring at, in the partlycloudy earlymorning sky, none had any idea what it was either. one man suggested that maybe "marshal hall amusement park", on the maryland side of the potomac,might be using a balloon to their finsl "fallfest activities", before they closed for the winter. when i pointed out that it would be in the "landing approach area for national airport", the idea of a "tethered ad ballon" was eliminated quickly. later,absolutely, as a 727 heading into national,to land,flew under this stack(the plane's tailfin reflecting the morningsun. showed the multicolor stack was about 70 feet tall,with 4-5 layers of colored bands). no blinking lights etc. not even metallic glare, only slightly rounded at the top and bottom, maybe 30-40 feet wide,side to side. this may be the answer to where the ufo's that hastled the capital etc., in 1952, vanished to as the jets,from dover afb, came on the scene!. they zoomed up and away then came back under the radar, stacked up quietly and hid in the woods till the jets left, then seperated and went back to their harrassing the capital fun!. what really bugged me, was the fact that my "vhs camcorder" would not work(even with the fullycharged batterypak, i had put in after dinner the nite before!)and opps!!, my lil'35 mm quicky still camera needed the one item seven-eleven did not sell, film!!. asking around the group(now 7-9 watchers!!) i found not one camera, of anykind, was available!. someone said"oh it's going into the clouds", not really however, the wind was blowing the clouds north to south. this giant"lifesaver roll" had not budged, for almost an hour and ahalf!. but, i had to leave at about 7:20 or so, i left for home,to fix  and eat breakfast, at last!. as i left, i noticeed the three "watchers" had grown to a crowd of 8 or 10; and the store manager said "i don't know what it is?,but it's great for business". his coffee and donuts were selling, like crazy, no one wanted to leave(and miss a plane knocking it out of the sky??). real disappointment was no reports in the news etc. just dozens of interviews, about the meteor,of the night before,after all it had upset a football game crowd!. several pilots, flying from europe to eastcoast cities, had seen it streak across the sky and gave "noah" an approximate location to where it  hit in new york. there had been no reports,or complaints,by pilots about an object being in the way as they approched "washington national airport"!!.. a majer question is why?!!, those congressional boobs on the hill seem to think the general public is satisfied with their dumb explinations of what we know, we are seeing more and more everyday/or night too. i know there must have been dozens more witness's, up and down the potomac river, from dc to mt.Vernon, many much closer than we were. maybe you can persuade them to come forward with their story and videos and/or pics. this is one occurence i, and many more, would like a good solid answer for... thankyou for any help, c.E. love
content.summary: I and 6-7 others in 7-11's parkinglot watched a stationary

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside briefly for a quick cigarette and was listening to a bird on top of one of the light poles in our parking lot at work near tucson international airport. i looked up to identify the bird and noticed a stationary round object pretty high in altitude. 

i pointed it out to a another employee who was outside. the object was toward the west from our building near drexel and tucson blvd. it appeared to be pretty high in altitude. it was difficult to determine the actual shape of the object but it was brownish-red in color. we observed this for several minutes. 

for approximately 30 seconds a second object appeared to the lower right of the first. this second object was white in color and round in shape. it seemed to be emanating or reflecting light as opposed to being a white colored object but was difficult to determine due to it's altitude. the second appeared to pace the first at the same slow rate of speed and then disappeared after 30 seconds of duration. at that point neither object was visible.

i wouldn't have thought anything of the incident but after reports of the reappearence of the "phoenix lights" on april 21st i thought this was interesting enough to report.
content.summary: Viewd a slow moving round shape somewhat high in altitude.

content.detailedDescription: During the night on march 27th, 2007,in arlington, tx, i went outside with my friends to show them how well my new telescope worked in the night sky. about then minutes pass, and i just look around the night sky, enjoy the stars, when i see what i believed to be a bright star, at that moment. this "star" was brighter than anyother around it, and it just stood there, very bright and not moving an inch. i then decide to my friends that i wanted to gaze at this beautiful "star". i turn around with my telescope, and in my amazement, this object started moving, fast. it slowed down after coming a quarter off from west, then sped up and got brighter. the moon was nice and big during this moment. it seemed to be flying towards it. after a minute of awkward flight, of extreme stopping, to extreme speeds, it flew, as i saw it, infront of the moon. i expected it to fly accross the moon and appear on the other side. instead it disapeared. my friends and i all pondered on what this object could have been. i ruled out a helicopter, plane, or comet. in the end, i couldn't figure out what this object was. it was a ufo. recently my nights have been more or less awkward. i researched on time loss effects, and as i felt them. in a night, i didn't move an inch, and wake up, a mear couple of seconds, before my alarm clock went off. if any physical problems have occured, i don't know, yet some sleepless nights come off some awkward dreams.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright, fast, not natural, star and stop flight, what now?

content.detailedDescription:
During the most recent lunar eclipse i decided to try to get digital photos of the event as it transpired. i set my fuji camera at maximum magnafication & took some shots. just as the moon was coming out of the shadow it looked awesome as i took this final shot. at this time i could not see anythind other than the moon in my cameras screen. afterwards i decided to transfer the last image to my laptop to possibly use it as my wallpaper.
after i did the transfer & the photo was at full screen size, i noticed a triangular looking tiny object with what looked like an aircrafts lights in the lower left side of the picture. as i blew up that area of the photo, the object began to look very odd. i then realized that it definetly was not an aircraft that i had ever seen before.I noticed that it had a sphere at one end with some very large circular ports. the sphere was attached to a long cylnder and at the tail end there were three angular swept back wings with a smaller sphere at the end of each wing, i was not able to get a nice clear image & tried to get several places to try to get a clearer image with their equipment. i contacted the seattle times via e-mail to see if they might be interested in attempting to clear up the photo & possibly help identify it, with no response from them. whenever i show this image to family & friends they think it is an other worldly object.I have not downloaded the digital image from my camera to this pc. if you are interested i could have a dvd burned & send it to you!
content.summary: Unknown object in digital photo of lunar ecipse at night

content.detailedDescription: It was just after new years countdown in burbank, ca. i was at my cousins home and we were celebrating in the back yard. after we rang in the new year, i noticed some people at the party (kids and adults) looking up in the sky very puzzled. i decided to take a look for myself at what was catching everyones attention. my first thought was, how cool fire crackers. that thought only lasted for about five seconds and i watched the 5 bright redish-orange stars float from very low maybe 100 feet from the ground to the sky a few hundred feet higher never burning out like a fire cracker would. the star like objects seemed to change color from a bright redish to greenish to blue and back to red again. they also seemed to be flying in formation as they rotated around each other and occasionally seemed to blink off and on. i know for certain what we saw in the sky on new years was not a fire cracker, because i have watched many fire cracker shows and no fire cracker can stay in the air for over 10 minutes with out burning out. as we all cheered the ufo's in the sky i couldn't help but feel very excited and frightened at the same time. i realized that what ever was in the sky could cause great harm if it wanted to. but it seemed as though it was trying to give us a sign more than anything else by the way it was rotating and forming different circular and triangular formations. the objects eventually seemed to disappear from the sky one by one until they were all gone. it was not clear if it was one  single craft or individual crafts flying side by side. the only video we were able to catch was of one of the objects on my friends cell phone. it is not very clear, just looks like a star in the sky.
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Fireball,  Flash,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: The sighting was minutes after new years count down. there were about 5 to 6 star-like objects.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i walked out of my friends house at exactly 1:30am on tuesday april 22, 2008.  exactly two minutes into our walk we observed a bright white oval object with a redish-orange tail moving slowly above us in the western direction.  the craft appeared to be the size of a dime at arms length.  the craft made no discernable noise as it passed slowly overhead.  without warning it flashing a bright green color then all color ceased to reveal a smaller albeit same shaped black object that shot out of view over several rooftops.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Oval shaped craft with red tail

content.detailedDescription: The wife is 63& a half inches tall,we are at the mission and i am taking pictures of my wife and son coming to me.I am standing with my back to the sea and they are walking to me.The picture is taken over the mission to the northeast.Iam going to try and send you the pictures, they are digital but it is my first digital camera, i wish i would have had my new camera.If you need i can get my sons height also but i do not want this to get back to us but i'll help if i can.Try and let us know what there size are if you can.I would have to go to the area again to know for sure where the picture was taken.
content.summary: I took the pictures but didn't see them,wife is pointing to them but does not know what or if she is seeing them

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my golf shoes back to my car after playing golf the evening of 4/22/2008 and was looking up at the stars when i noticed one star get brighter ( about 3 times its normal light ) so i thought it was just a flare or flicker and decided to watch it. the light got brighter and about 3 times larger than its original size, which i thought was strange and thought maybe it was a shooting star coming directly towards me. so i continued to watch and the light stayed motionless for about 4 seconds after getting larger and brighter, then started moving towards the west skyline at a slow pace. as the light traveled to the right it got dimmer until it was no longer visible. the light was not in our atmosphere and was definitely in space and traveled away from the earth and was not a flare, airplane, or shooting star.

may have been nothing but too strange not to report.. especially with other reports of lights on 4/21/2008. i think preparation would be better then trying to sweep events like this under a rug. if we are not prepared for an encounter, then we are suceptible as a human race for survival.
content.summary: Circular light

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped at a traffic light on a highway just west of grand island.  the highway was in a rural area and it was late in the evening.  i noticed that there were bright lights - maybe five of them - almost directly overhead at a height that was probably less than 100 feet.  i hadn't noticed anything as i was driving north on the road before i came to the stoplight.  i thought it might be a helicopter with lights attached along the landing apparatus (ski-shaped with slight curve at ends), but couldn't hear anything above the engine noise of my car (a vw bug), and i didn't see the outline of a helicopter, just the lights.  suddenly, the lights moved in unison very fast to the east (i was headed north), and then made a very sharp 90-degree turn to the north over a row of tall trees maybe a quarter mile away.  the lights headed north and were quickly out of sight.  i remember the date pretty well, as i had left the chicago area early that day and was relieved that i wouldn't have to listen to any more campaign ads (it was election day).  in any case, maybe someone else saw the lights.  i've always thought it was pretty strange, that i didn't couldn't hear a helicopter that was directly overhead.  the lights were stationary long enough for me to try to hear something over the engine noise.  the subsequent speed and the 90-degree turn were surprising.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright lights that were stationary overhead suddenly moved very fast, made 90-degree turn

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on rt. 1a in walpole, ma, towards the center of town at approximatley 10:30 p.M.
i noticed what appeared to be some type of aircraft, or possibly lights at the top of a tower. there is no tower in that vicinity.
what i saw was 3 large circular, white, bright lights in a row, about 200 ft. above the tree line. it seemed to be way to low for an aircraft. the lights appeared to be part of a rectangular craft of some type. what struck me is that it did not move.
i decided to pull into a small shopping plaza parking lot, because i seemed to be getting closer to it. i did not take my eye off of it, until i turned off the main road. as soon as i took the turn into the parking lot i looked back to the spot where it was previously, and it was gone.
this all took a matter of a few minutes.
i emailed my friend the following morning, who was traveling in the same direction at approximatley the same time if he had seen anything while driving home, without describing anything i had seen. he replied that he had and described exactly what i had seen.
content.summary: 3 large white lights in a row hovering low in the sky. i was driving south on rt. 1a. appeared to be an aircraft of some kind, but remained in the same spot without moving at all.

content.detailedDescription: My 13 yr old kids saw it as well through binoculors
content.summary: Red green and blue lights, on a 4/23/08, saw it again with telescope, 4 white lights in straight line

content.detailedDescription:
In may ( day before mother's day) in about 1974, i drove to foothills mall to pick up my children who had been shopping for my mother's day gift at sears. i picked them up at the north entrance of sears.
one daughter said" look up mom."  i was astounded to see an enormous metalic disc shaped object sitting a couple of hundred feet over the malls north parking lot.
no one else in the parking lot seemed to see it or were concerned about it.
it was shortly after the mall had opened and we initially thought it was advertising gimmick for the opening of the sears store at the mall. but it was much too large to have been a hot air balloon, or any other balloon.
it started moving east...So we tried to follow since we were going that direction anyway....But it quickly disappeared after we attempted to follow it for several blocks. it was an exciting experience.  i wish i could have hypnosis to take me back so i could remember more details of the object.
we watched for something about it in the local news and never saw anything.
because we didn't think anyone would believe us,  we have mentioned this to very few people.  
another strange part of the experience was that we all seemed to have some sort of amnesia about the siting. seemed to forget it about it for several years. 
none of this would make sense to most people.  
whether it was a group hallucination, or what else it was...We will never know.
there wasn't any loss of time involved and we were never closer than a few hundred feet.
this happened about 35 years ago...So our memories of this object are all a little different. my children are in their 30's and 40's now...But we do all live here in fort collins.
there were no cell phones in those days...So we had nothing to take a picture.  sure wish we had.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc shaped object seen in early 1970's over sears at foothills fashion mall, by myself and children.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard smoking a cigarette. it was probably between ten thirty p.M. and eleven thirty p.M. it might have been a little later. i enjoy watching the night sky. looking at stars and watching planes go by. i heard a plane and looked up. that is when i noticed the lights. it was to the south of me. moving from west to east. i think there were maybe seven lights. it was sort of boomerang shaped and there were more lights on one side than the other. the two end lights were alternately flashing as it moved. i thought it was a plane but it was bigger or closer than it appeared to be. after the plane that had made me look up in the first place flew by,the red lights were the only thing in that area, and i didn't hear any engine sound. there were no other colored lights as you would expect on a plane. no white or blue. i called my son to come out and look. it took him about two minutes to come out. i had called him several times in that time. it seemed to be moving diagonally, not straight from the center bend of the lights. it was going in a southeast direction. after the end lights flashed back and forth, all of the lights rotated from one end to the other and started back from the beginning. then all of the lights stayed solid. it then just disappeared. just faded and was gone. there were some clouds in the sky that night so i waited to see if maybe it had flown into them and would re-appear, but it never showed up again. unfortunately i didn't take pictures, as i don't keep my camera charged and didn't want to stop watching what i was seeing. i was very excited but nervous at the same time. i doubted myself, and thought i had to be mistaken by what i was seeing, until i saw a news report about lights over arizona, so i decided to write in. i am wondering if anyone else in my area saw something around that time. or if anyone can tell me what it was.
content.summary: Maybe seven red lights boomerang shape more lights on one side than other.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside a church with my family waiting for my brother to get out of a boyscout meeting.  we were in the parking lot.  i looked up and noticed a glowing greenish object appeared traveling from west to east.  it passed directly overhead.  it appeared to be rotating on its horizontal axis, and 'bouncing' at the same time, with some flaps that extended and retracted while it was bouncing.  there was a central sphere, and a ring around it, with the above described arms that extended from it.  i don't recall it making a sound.  i estimate it was about 500 feet overhead, and traveling at about 75-100 mph.  my mother saw it too, but she blew it off, and denied any recollection of details later.  i can't recall, but i think i called the wheaton police to report it.  i was a young teenager at the time.  the event has stayed with me forever, and i wonder if this type of object has been reported before, or in the same area around the same date.  i am not sure at all about the dates, but put it somewhere between 1970 and 1974.  it was warm out, and we were waiting for my brother to get out of his boyscout meeting. my sister was younger and has no recollection of the event.  my father, an electrical engineer, knew i was upset by the incident and was sure there was a 'logical' explanation of it.  it was never discussed after this.  i am now a college professor with a doctoral degree and i am just as certain now that what i saw was a ufo as i was that night.  i have never discussed this with anyone for fear of being perceived as crazy.  the object just continued on its trajectory until i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Glowing object appeared bouncing overhead at about 500 ft. agl

content.detailedDescription:
I am an extremely rational and left brained person. i am currently a strait a student at san diego state university going back to finish a b.S. degree in my late 20's. i would never believe in anything as statistically unlikely as a ufo of alien origins happening upon our little planet, and while i witnessed something that is seemingly unexplainable, i can only assume there is a rational non-alien related explanation. but this experience happened over ten years ago, and i hardly talk about or remember it, recent media coverage of sightings have brought back memories that send chills up and down my body like nothing else can.
i was 17 years old and on summer break from high school. this was 1996 and could have happened anytime in the summer between june and august, not exactly sure as i never really documented the details. 
my highschool sweetheart and i went camping in the higher of the two public campground, i belive paso picacho campground. i have been to this campground many times in the past but never returned, oddly i am thinking about going there in mid may after finals because my interest in camping was jump started by a visit to yosemite last week.
anyway it happened sometime between midnight and 2am i assume. my girlfriend and i had to go to the bathroom and got out of the tent and walked over to a tree not too far from the tent. we went on either side of the tree to relieve ourselves and while going to the bathroom i was looking up in the stary sky and noticed a bright white light like the same color but more intense than the color of a star or venus when brightly lit. something seemed out of place.
when i finished up i noticed my girlfriend was looking up at the same light as she was finishing up... i asked her if she saw what i was looking at and she said yes. she quickly finished and we stood next to eachother and watched this odd star/planet like light move through the sky in a slow and un-aircraft like way and grow in size dramatically, i was thinking is this a satelite or a strange experimental aircraft??? 
then after a short time the slow moving light began to zoom in at us, it seemed like it was coming right for us (right now, writing this, the skin on my whole body is crawling with chills) it became frightening and my girlfriend started to panic because it moved at us from such a seemingly distant location to so very close and just overhead. there was no sound, no logical explanation for the way this light grew and moved to us, but her panic probably jump started panic in myself and we moved quickly to the car, got in and started driving down the campground road to escape whatever was coming at us. we could see out the window that whatever it was was indeed following us (odd thing is i cannot say how large it was or how close it really got, but the perception of closeness and impending danger was extremely real) ... we drove a couple hundered yards before i decided that runing from a light in the sky was crazy and pulled over infront of an inhabited campsite. we got out and immeditely noticed the light had backed off but was somehow still present in the sky... (my memory is a little fuzzy about how the light went from chasing us to backing off)... but nonetheless we sat on a log within 40 feet of some stranger's tents, for safety, and saw the light disapear into the star filled night sky. venus was particularly bright that night and i tried my hardest to rationalize some atmospheric interaction that caused venus to perform such extremely unusual and unnatural movements, but cannot rationally be satisfied with any such explanation. 
i do not remember if we got any sleep that night but the event was real and had a profound impact on me and my girlfriend at the time. we were both completely sober and witnessed the same thing that caused us to drive for our lives and still gives me chills today anytime i recall the vivid details.... odd thing is that now i reflect on the event some of the temporal aspects of the event seem unclear.. i believe it all happened in 20 minutes or less but upon deeper thought we may have been over an hour. 
i would really like to know what i saw that night and find relief in the rational explanation even if it is something as far fetched as an alien drone craft sent to remotely sense our natural resources.... the frustrating thing is that i know i will never know the truth.
content.summary: Camping in rancho cuyamaca state park, went to bathroom with gfriend and saw the oddest thing

content.detailedDescription: I live in a well known historical building on the southside of downtown dallas on the 7th floor.  my girlfriend and i were watching tv, i was laid out on a couch by the wall with all the windows on it facing south.  i stood up from the couch and randomly looked out the window, as i did i saw something moving and glowing faintly in the sky a couple hundred feet above a 10-story building to the left of my vision.  within, the initial split second that i saw "something" in my mind i thought and tried to figure out if i was seeing some sort of light reflection from the room back in the window, as it had just rained and there were raindrops on the windows and i wasn't sure if when i stood up and was moving i was seeing some sort of diffuse interior light refracted in the window, so i steadied myself.  as i steadied myself to make sure i was indeed seeing something it passed through my head that these might be the beam of a spotlight / marquis light in the sky (the kind they use for sales events), and by this time i realized it was 3 diffused, cloudlike glows moving through the sky, from left to right.  now in the time i stood up and the spotted this and reasoned all this it was only about 3-4 seconds and i was concurrently saying out loud to my girlfriend "what the heck is that, do you see that [around the point that i was steadying myself for a good look]".  as i stood there still i realized that it was definitely 3 objects, diffused behind the clouds (it was a rainy night with low clouds).  the objects looked like diffuse oval glows (almost like clouds themselves, just slightly brighter), approximately only about 800-1000 feet in the sky, headed in a slight slant upwards into the southern sky.  they moved at a very steady, uniform speed and trajectory and acceleration, nothing too wavy or unexpected.  and just gradually, smoothly increased speed until they gradually moved up into the sky, the darkness and could no longer be discerned.  my girlfriend had stood up with me to watch them, and the whole time i was asking "do you see it, do you see them", and she kept saying "where? i'm trying".  finally, she said "i think i saw them".  the objects weren't anything spectacular, like obviously defined crafts, but just like glowing clouds.  the way they moved, with this steady smooth acceleration and at such low altitude i reasoned just could not be military or civilian aircrafts.  i've never see any man made object fly through the sky like that, it was very smooth, and in fact very quick, but a very gradual quickness.  after they were gone, had just gradually faded, my girlfriend stood there with me, intent upon seeing them, she suggested they might come back, i was like "no, they're definitely not coming back around", they appeared as if they were setting out, taking off, if you will, off into the sky, not like they were hovering or floating around.  we looked around in the window to see if anything came back around, or if anything else was out in the sky and indeed never saw anything.
content.summary: 3 diffuse glowing, blended orbs move across sky

content.detailedDescription: We were on hwy i-10 traveling from ca. to az. at approx 10 p.M. the speedometer in the car started jumping erratically from 0- 130 miles per hour.  this was strange as my speedometer doesn't even wiggle in the slightest, ever!  we jokingly said, 'the aliens must be overhead". seriously i was worried that i was about to have car trouble in this very unpopulated, no services area.  we call it no mans land between indio ca. & the state line.  the speedometer continued to act erratically for about 1/2 hour and as suddenly as it started it regained it's usual reliable behavior.  we would never have thought much more about this except then we heard the reports of the light sightings over the phoenix area that left the view of that vicinity around 10p.M. anyway, just letting you know of a weird, coincidental occurrence.
content.summary: Travelling from ca. to az on i10 speedometer started jumping all over

content.detailedDescription: i was riding my bike and my little sister was riding her skooter then my sister stoped and said whats that and i said maybe its a ufo it was a speck of gray in the sky a longways away and it was moveing exterimely slow and then i couldnt see it any more.Oh and i was by my house.I whent in the house to get benoculers but i couldnt find them so i went back out side and it was still there i was so happy iv allways wanted to see a ufo. and i geus i did??? and aftter it went away i whent in side a happy person!!!
content.summary: It was a gray speck that stayd in one place.

content.detailedDescription:
I have always wanted to report this to a legitimate source but never knew how.  i have never forgotten my experience, it was shocking.

my nephew (four years younger than myself) and i were up late at his house in downey, ca, playing super nes games in a back bedroom, drinking snapple, eating chips. late night. no drugs or alcohol involved whatsoever. we had a back door open, with a screen door in place since the temperature was warm.

my nephew had his back to a window in the room. i was sitting on the floor, facing the television with my body angled 3/4 to this window.

we played videogames for about a half hour or so and at one point, through the window, i saw a huge, cigar-shaped object slowly veer at an angle slightly downward in the sky, off in the distance. the object was luminous, mostly blue, with white at the center. i could get a sense of scale since i could see it behind the treeline across the street. seeing this, i went into a state or absolute horror, practically numb.  i had trouble speaking, i was shocked and quite honestly afraid and in disbelief.  my nephew was scared to turn around to see what i was looking at. i was finally able to yell "look!" and he turned around. he yelled "holy shit! what the f***?!" and slid off of the bed he was sitting on. thank god he saw it too because no one would believe just me.

the object made no sound as it moved for several seconds. then it suddenly made a sharp angled turn upward and took off at a high rate of speed. gone.

we were in disbelief, maybe even in shock, i don't know.  we sat there and all we could say was "what the f***?!" over and over.  we tried rationalizing it - traded theories.  a blimp?  no... no way it would move like that.  a helicopter with searchlights?  no, it was too big, too fast, and made no noise.  we then heard something outside - and i swear to god i am not lying - we heard something outside the screen door that i can only describe as a garbled voice.  we almost died.  we looked at each other. neither one of us would say what we heard because i'm pretty sure we thought we were losing our minds.  "what did you hear just now?" i said. he repiled "no, what did you hear?"  we were scared shitless.  this went on for what seemed like half a minute.  we both imitated the sound and agreed on what we heard.  after that i remember getting up the nerve to go outside in the dark to see what the noise was.  we made some jokes to ease the tension. i didn't see anything but i will tell you this: we were so stunned by the experience we didn't know what to do for days.  i'm an artist so immediately i went to sketch and color what we saw. i wanted to tell everyone.  i think i even called the downey police department the next day.

one item to note.  when i first saw the object, my face went into such a look of horror that afterward my nephew told me he thought there was someone in the window with a gun!

the date is sketchy, it was so long ago.  i could preobably narrow the date down better if i had to.

if you have read this far, i hope it means something.  thank you for reading and doing what you do.

i believe!
content.summary: Nephew and i saw silent, cigar-shaped craft move, take off, then heard noises

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i witnessed the immobile star, i was with my father. we stayed up the entire night, watching the stars. we both believe in ufos, extra-terrestial or military related, due to a previous sighting in my childhood, which i will not post in this report, but perhaps in another. it was at night, between 10 pm and 12 am. we were sitting on our porch. our house is built facing direct north on a hill overlooking a depression in elevation that continues roughly 100 yrds until our land meets the road, the other side of which has trees whose tops would likely meet the elevation of our hill. this allows us a clear sight between direct north west to roughly north north east, as a tree relatively close to the house blocks further sight. as we watched the stars, we noticed several that flashed or shimmered. this is natural, and can occur for many reasons, but we took note anyways. however, we noticed a single star just above the treeline across the road. there was nothing of significance, onlt that it flashed different colors, and may shimmer in and out of sight, most likely due to the trees. the sky, of course, moves across the night, and the locations of the stars in the sky moves from sun down to sun up. as time passed, this star, however, did not move. we paid close attention to the relative positions of stars to objects we can easily associate. the sky was indeed moving as it should, yet this star, which flashed red, blue, and, as memory serves, kept an orange-ish hue, did not move in the night sky. my father and i retired early, ending our nightwatch between 1 am and 2 am. the star had still not moved by that time.

the second sighting of this immobile star makes it not entirely immobile. i was with a friend, at the same location, a few weeks later, starting the nightwatch some time between 10 pm and 12 am with full intention to remain awake until dawn. we talk about the possibility of life on other planets. i notice the same flashing star in the same place, and point it out to him. we watch the night sky, but i found myself disappointed, this star did move during the course of the night. however, we both noticed it stopped near the tree that, as i previously mentioned, blocks line of sight past north north east. we used the branches to set it's rate of movement. the sky moves from north north west to north north east from downwards to upwards over the course of the night. this star followed that, but remained immobile. we watched the sky and talked for hours, paying special attention to this star. it did not move any more. we noticed as the sky lightened, from it's darkish hue to a lighter shade at a relatively fast rate. then, as the light illuminated the sky, we could see clouds above the trees that we could not without this new daylight. the star remained in the beginning stages of the light, but then, the true reason for a 'sighting'. the star, at a rate...  i'm not sure, but i would estimate sextuple the rate of movement for the lingering night sky, and it moved nearly violently upwards on the night sky's trajectory. i will not say that it disappeared into the clouds, as in it was below and went through them to conceal itself, or if it disappeared behind the clouds. all i know is it was concealed due to it's upward motion towards the now illuminated clouds. i cannot remember clearly, and i will not deplete the integrity of this report by falsifying the details. it truly scared myself and my friend that this immobile star suddenly moved much quicker than any star should in the first place, but that it remained immobile for some time.

i have stayed up several times until dawn with another friend since then, yet i have not been able to find this star again.

the first time i noticed it, with my father, it puzzled me, but nothing else. the second time, i was afraid that something would defy nature as such as this star did.

if it would serve as any help, i frequently see military aircraft moving to and fro between air bases, as my house is relatively close to the flight path.

i have not recorded a picture or a video as i did not own a working camera/video recorder at the time.
content.summary: Immoble star rests until dawn, moves as sun rises. two events included.

content.detailedDescription: About 3 years ago i was setting up my 10inch f4.5 newtonian telescope to a astro-vid video camera, i was using the moon to make adjustments while recording. i noticed nothing on the screen at the time because i was moving back and forth between monitor and scope. but on playback i noticed something move across the monitor which at first i thought was a bug. but it was recorded and i played it many times trying to figure out what it was. after checking around with friends they told me it was not the space shuttle. it had a sort of triangle shape and seemed to be doing barrel rolls. i was told that the shuttle doesen't do barrel rolls. i have the vhs tape in my possession. no one else seemed to be interested in it so it sat. if you want to see video send me an address and i will.
content.summary: Recorded on vhs tape

content.detailedDescription:
Around 7:30pm, in febuary of 1995, i was walking my yorkshire terrier (brandy)in summerfield florida, and she looked up and started barking, i followed her gaze and saw a distant light that i first thought was a helicopter or a plane doing some sort of recon for the cape.( it was pretty far away, and nasa was getting ready to launch the shuttle the next day.) i watched it for a couple of minutes expecting it to fade from view, but it didn't, it had stopped probably about 5-7 miles away. it just hung in the sky like a light bulb, then it flared up really bright and i opened the door and hollered to my family to come and see this, (it really kinda excited me), my mother, girlfriend at the time, her daughter all came out just in time to see it pulse even brighter, and four other lights"broke off", of it and went in 4 different directions, the first light dimmed a little and stayed put. i was really excited now because to the best of my knowledge, we don't have craft capable of that type of thing. we all watched it for about another 10 minutes give or take, then the 4 other craft all at once came back in as quickly as they had gone, and "rejoined" the main craft. then without even a blink it shot straight up into the sky zipped slightly due west southwest and was gone in a matter of seconds. my family and i talked about it for awhile, commenting on the way the craft came apart and then back together and then the way it left.We also discussed the ramifications of it being present one day before the launch of the shuttle. i had put it to the back of my mind until i saw a show on t.V. tonight about the governments ability to reverse enginneer e.T.S'cadillac. it got me to remembering the event and i thought you might want to hear about it.
i have no pictures or sketches of it, but it was kind of diamond shaped, and manuvuered very quickly at sharp angles and made little to no noise, especislly with the speed it was travelling.
content.summary: Walking my dog, she started barking at the sky,

content.detailedDescription: My german shepherd had pups on march 19 03. i let her out side and thats when i noticed a shadow come over the house the moon was shineing the shadow coverd my yard and my nieghbors house about 300 hunderd feet or more. the trees across the road where swaying back and forth gently the sound was a hum like. i had never heard a sound like that before it was large and scared me.It had some lights on it they where stationary.I did not know what it was but i think it was a ufo .It was black underside gray ontop circular in shape hard to really tell because i was scared i went inside told my husband about it called my brother who lives southeast of me to look out side he said it was travling towards warrenton .So i got in my car followed it but soon lost it going towards the virgina i was on hwy 401 north travling towards warrenton when it disapeared thats it been lookind for it to come back but no luck .Iam always carefull at night now when i go outside maybe it will come back.I never belived in ufo's but seeing is beliveing.
content.summary: It come over my house low large football statium size trees swaying gentely low hum behind object had some lights travled east towards warrenton slow moving followed it but lost it

content.detailedDescription:
I was star gazing with my 10" dobsonian and my binoculars.  i looked at an aircraft flying by when i saw what appeared to be a group of objects that were very dim and kind of undulating like a shred of cloud.  the objects were arranged in sort of an m shape and undulating almost like a cloud.  i first noticed it when it was 35 degrees elevation nw and it moved in a westerly direction about the speed of a slowish passenger jet.  there was no wind and no clouds and good visibility.  i have seen this object before but did not report it since i figured it must have been a very fast moving cloud since there was wind on previous days, even though the objects never moved in the direction of the wind on the ground.  

i saw another person report this object and it acted very similar in behavior to what i saw.  i am quite certain it was not a flock of geese, since it was moving way too fast and the undulations were moving to fast for a flock of geese as well.  i have seen many geese and many objects in the sky.
content.summary: Looked like a flock of birds but moving way too fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding in a car in south florida between 95 in miami and the road to the florida keys.  i saw a group of lights hovering and went right by it in the car, it was close, i kept staring expecting to see a tower, a microwave, radio tower or something this group of lights was attached to and i kept staring as i was a passenger and it was on my side of the road (we were driving from the keys toward miami).  i did not see the metal tower that the lights were attached to.  i have thought about this for 10 days and decided to write about it.

i first noticed because the driver of the vehicle i was in asked me what was that light attached to?  

3.  i thought it was attached to a radio tower, it was not.

4.  the object did not move, it was stable.  i quit staring it as we drove right by it.  it was close to the road, but suspended maybe 400-600 feet in the air.

5.  my feelings were that it was some sort of optical illusion.

6. we drove by it, it was still there and i thought no more about it except wondered why i did not see the tower it was attached to.

did anyone else see this in south florida?  i can talk to the driver and find out more exactly what road we were on.  i was a tourist and didn't have a good idea where we really were.
content.summary: A group of lights

content.detailedDescription:
I lived out in a wooded area and was sitting on the steps looking at the stars.I noticed this object moving across the night sky up in the stars at a high rate of speed.It crossed from the west to the east.It was zooming past the stars fast.At first i thought it was a plane.But it had no lights.It was just a bright silvery matalic cylinder of and object with out wings,i went and got my binoculars.It covered the whole horizon in less than 9 minutes.
  when i was a kid about 9 or 10.There was 6 of use playing kick the can.A sort of jail break game.When a fire ball like object flew past our back yards along a creek and disapeared.We all went back to see what it was but got scared in the woods in the dark,and ran scaring ourselves more.It was in laurel springs along the creek running off of the lake.None of us heard anything about it though.And where to scared to go back to see for ourselves.
  one other thing.I have a brother who said i am not to say anything about this.He was in the navy for 33 years.He said that the ufo's are not from space but are from earth.That they come out from under the ice packs.He was stationed in antartica for 3 years.And in our oceans.And are more uso,s than ufo,s. 
  i beleive there is something here with us.And the governments of all countrys know and are giving us a bunch of malarky about what we are seeing out there.Weather balloons my ass 
  i would take a lie detector test to prove all this.
content.summary: Cylinder shaped object moving west to east at a high rate of speed across the nite sky

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the dog out for a walk in my back yard when i heard a pulsating humming sound.  i would describe the sound as loud enough to grab my attention and make me look up.  the sound was not steady, but alternating between quiet and loud.  i looked up and saw a glowing yellowish light flying over a row of townhomes behind my house.  the light had a yellow glow and was ovalish in shape.  as the light flew over the homes and out of view, i noticed that all of the lights in a couple of the nearby homes turned on, more or less around the same time.  it was at this time that the sound faded away.  the whole event happened very fast in a timespan of about 4 seconds.
content.summary: Sighted yellowish glowing light flying over row of townhouses and heard pulsating humming sound

content.detailedDescription: I couldn't sleep that night. i looked out the windw to see firetrucks going by, and got much more than i bargained for. there was a triangular shaped craft slowly gliding, almost hovering, from north to south. it had 3 lights, a white-amber color, that marked the corners on the ufo. in the very center, an amber colored light would turn on and off. the light would start dim, get brighter, then go out. as it did this, a searchlight emmited from it, going down to about treetop level. to my horror, about 2 years ago, i saw the same craft, this time much higher than the first. i knew the craft right off the bat. it moved at the same speed, and again made no noise what so ever.
content.summary: Slow moving triangle w/ 4 distinct lights.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother called me just a bit ago from a little league baseball game in newtown pa to tell me he and everybody at the game stopped to watch an orange fireball that looked like it was crashing out of the sky.

he said it first looked like something was out of control with an erratic trail but then described the trail as going straight and was very far away to the north of his location moving away from them.

i asked if he could compare it to anything and he said it kind of looked like when the space shuttle crashed but it was just one object.

he told me the color was orange and for a second the object got white like it got white-hot or something like that.

he tried to take a cell phone photo but it was to far away.
we are hoping someone else photos of it as it seemed that many people saw this object.
i told him i thought this was very interesting as there were two reports last week of objects falling from the sky as well in indiana and north carolina, there has to be something to these events.

if anyone else saw this please report it on mufon.
content.summary: Orange/white object with fire trail seen crashing from the sky in northeast pa.
